title: REC signs 200 million euro loan with German Bank KfW to propel distribution sector reforms
description: This marks REC's sixth line of credit under the Indo-German Development Cooperation and demonstrates the commitment to enhance the distribution infrastructure of discoms (distribution companies) in line with the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (RDSS) of the Government of India (GoI).
